About us

===================================
HOSTERDADDY is a longstanding brand, launched by Zatak Internet Services and Nowadays its became HosterDaddy Private Limited. It operates since the 1st of Jan, 2013. HOSTERDADDY provides hosting services for individuals and small to mid-range businesses, as well as large corporations. We have no hidden charges like TAX, VAT, etc. We ensure best high quality web hosting to our customers at cheap price. We are currently offering two locations - Canada and France on VPS plans and we have like more than 5 locations on shared Hosting. Our main priority is to provide our customers with secure & private hosting services at an affordable price to fulfill all their hosting needs.


HosterDaddy takes privacy very seriously of our clients. We never disclose our client's information to any 3rd party. We take 100% guarantee on data which you share with us. We always protect our client's from any kind of attacks on their hosting services.



We maintain all the logs of payments, clients, products and services of our clients to avoid any sort of confusions in future. This makes more friendly and easier to use.

We accept PayPal, Credit Cards, Debit Cards, Skrill, Payza, BitCoin and Perfect Money.
